inscription: left: 自摺　昭和五年作　瀬戸内海　倉 {jizuri, Shōwa gonen saku, Seto naikai, Kura}; bottom, in pencil: Kura in Tomonoura, Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LRC, red artist's seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Inland Sea (Seto naikai 瀬戸内海) [second series]
text: The four prints along these two walls are from Yoshida Hiroshi’s second Inland Sea Series, which he printed in 1930, four years after the first. His original series was inspired by a trip he made in November 1910. The second follows a trip to the same area in March 1930.
title: Tomonoura Godowns
